mapper.select: SELECT commodity_code,tc.commodity_id, tcp.picture_address,commodity_name,category_first, category_second,commodity_retail_price,commodity_original_price ,commodity_totalCount,commodity_is_sold,commodity_is_lack, commodity_inventory, commodity_unit_id,tc.version from t_commodity tc join t_commodity_pic tcp on tc.commodity_id = tcp.commodity_id where commodity_is_recommend = #{commodityIsRecommend}

select tcom.commodity_id,tcom.commodity_code,tcp.picture_address,tcom.commodity_name,tcom.commodity_retail_price,tod.version from t_order tod join t_order_detail todd on tod.order_id = todd.order_id join t_commodity tcom on todd.commodity_id = tcom.commodity_id join t_commodity_pic tcp on tcom.commodity_id = tcp.commodity_id where tod.customer_id = #{customerId} LIMIT 10
SELECT category_name,category_id, category_parent_id,category_level, category_remark,sort_no,version from t_category where category_parent_id = #{categoryParentId}
